snippet.title: [QUICKIE!] #78 "SPIRIT ROVER" | xkcd Game Jam WINNER! 2017 Indie Sci-fi Game (Gameplay/Playthrough)
snippet.description:
Lumps says: Spirit Rover was awarded 1st place in the xkcd Game Jam on Itch.io, and it was really well deserved. The game looks really nice for being made in 48 hours, the goal is simple (get to the end!) and the satisfaction of completing it was nice. It takes place on Mars (obviously) and was inspired by the xkcd comic #695 "Spirit". I think I did pretty well with only that many commands! Can you do any better? Grab the game at the link below and let me know how you do. Thanks for watching, like and sub if you're new. Cheers! 🍻

Itch.io says: "Send instructions to Spirit – a lonely rover stranded on Mars. A game created in three days for the xkcd game jam. Inspired by this comic."
https://sebastian.itch.io/spirit-rover
https://itch.io/jam/xkcdgamejam
https://xkcd.com/695/

Join the Lumps Plays party on Discord! https://discord.gg/65nJ3nb

Loving the pop up video commentary? Support me on Patreon! Donations go towards, you guessed it, indie games for videos!
https://www.patreon.com/lumpsplays

Want more Lumps Plays? Check out the archives:
One Shots & Demos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLC6dyS5uZ4TxSJCLqBxiX-R47Oc7KQIqp
[QUICKIES!]: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLC6dyS5uZ4TymE0fCW70Y0VUMEMv-c13q

Non-Horror Games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLC6dyS5uZ4TyfJhKCCSsoIf7zgwYQxvPK

And share the Lumps Play lovely game action with your friends! Go post it on your accounts now, I'll wait :D Cheers!
